answers.author: Andrea Fox
answers.text:
Hi Michael, are you looking to implement a single sustainability policy, a suite of policies, or a plan? I'd be happy to email you (and add to the Knowledge Network) examples of sustainability plans that include references to policies. There are also a number of sustainability plans currently uploaded to the Knowledge Network. Please let me know how I can be helpful.

City of Highland Park has adopted a Sustainability Plan back in 2010. Each year efforts are made to incorporate and implement portions of the Plan. A copy of Plan is available on our website under City Government http://www.cityhpil.com/documents/21/sustainabilityplan.PDF
